Docs.summary: Provides an interface for designers to access resource readers and writers for specific <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> resource types.

remarks.format:
## Remarks A resource writer or resource reader can be used to serialize or deserialze objects or data according to the specified <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> resource settings.
## Examples The following example demonstrates a designer that uses the IResourceService to read from and write to resource files in order to configure a property of an associated control.
